description:
Head into the alpine with confidence. This innovative hybrid axe design uses steel attachments on the pick and spike to increase the strength and durability or these points without significantly increasing the weight. Great for alpine or mountaineering routes where you're likely to encounter ice or hard snow.

  • Pick is aluminum with a Sandvik Nanoflex® steel tip
  • Hollow aluminum shaft is incredibly lightweight
  • Aggressive Sandvik Nanoflex® steel spike design plunges and anchors well
  • Head slot acceps a leash
name: Camp Corsa Nanotech Ice Axe
